Text:
Thank you so much for this (and the ebook as well).
I usually think it's annoying when people make requests - and so doing so myself makes me feel a bit dickish.
But do you have the PDF which accompanies the audiobook?  It'd be really handy to print out for workout and diet routines.  It's not conveniently laid out in the book version.
Either way, I much appreciate the upload.
Thanks.
